titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Parliament of England, Scotland and Ireland. The humble petition of the real lenders, upon the publick faith, the clothiers, and all others in the counties of Essex and Suffolk, in the behalf of themselves, and all others the like, that are unpaid.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Will. Tanner. John Coveney. George Sparling. Steven Hawe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
